Sql.query: insert into vtp_peaje_egreso_minfo( pegrmicodi, pegrcodi, pericodi, recpotcodi, genemprcodi, pegrdcodi, cliemprcodi, barrcodi, pegrmitipousuario, pegrmilicitacion, pegrmipotecalculada, pegrmipotedeclarada, pegrmicalidad, pegrmipreciopote, pegrmipoteegreso, pegrmipeajeunitario, barrcodifco, pegrmipoteactiva, pegrmipotereactiva, pegrmiusucreacion, pegrmifeccreacion, pegrmipotecoincidente, pegrmifacperdida, coregecodvtp, tipconcondi ) values( :pegrmicodi, :pegrcodi, :pericodi, :recpotcodi, :genemprcodi, :pegrdcodi, :cliemprcodi, :barrcodi, :pegrmitipousuario, :pegrmilicitacion, :pegrmipotecalculada, :pegrmipotedeclarada, :pegrmicalidad, :pegrmipreciopote, :pegrmipoteegreso, :pegrmipeajeunitario, :barrcodifco, :pegrmipoteactiva, :pegrmipotereactiva, :pegrmiusucreacion, :pegrmifeccreacion, :pegrmipotecoincidente, :pegrmifacperdida, :coregecodvtp, :tipconcodi )

update vtp_peaje_egreso_minfo set pegrcodi=:pegrcodi, pericodi=:pericodi, recpotcodi=:recpotcodi, genemprcodi=:genemprcodi, pegrdcodi=:pegrdcodi, cliemprcodi=:cliemprcodi, barrcodi=:cliemprcodi, pegrmitipousuario=:pegrmitipousuario, pegrmilicitacion=:pegrmilicitacion, pegrmipotecalculada=:pegrmipotecalculada, pegrmipotedeclarada=:pegrmipotedeclarada, pegrmicalidad=:pegrmicalidad, pegrmipreciopote=:pegrmipreciopote, pegrmipoteegreso=:pegrmipoteegreso, pegrmipeajeunitario=:pegrmipeajeunitario, barrcodifco=:barrcodifco, pegrmipoteactiva=:pegrmipoteactiva, pegrmipotereactiva=:pegrmipotereactiva, pegrmiusucreacion=:pegrmiusucreacion, pegrmifeccreacion=:pegrmifeccreacion where pegrmicodi=:pegrmicodi

select pegrmicodi, pegrcodi, pericodi, recpotcodi, genemprcodi, pegrdcodi, cliemprcodi, barrcodi, pegrmitipousuario, pegrmilicitacion, pegrmipotecalculada, pegrmipotedeclarada, pegrmicalidad, pegrmipreciopote, pegrmipoteegreso, pegrmipeajeunitario, barrcodifco, pegrmipoteactiva, pegrmipotereactiva, pegrmiusucreacion, pegrmifeccreacion from vtp_peaje_egreso_minfo where pegrmicodi = :pegrmicodi
select * from vtp_peaje_egreso_minfo where pericodi=:pericodi and recpotcodi=:recpotcodi order by pegrmiusucreacion

select --b.emprnomb as genemprnombre,c.emprnomb as cliemprnombre, case when (select count(*) from trn_infoadicional_det info where info.infadicodi = a.genemprcodi) > 0 then (select info.infadinomb from trn_infoadicional_det info where info.infadicodi = a.genemprcodi and info.fechacorte <= (select recafecins from trn_recalculo where pericodi = a.pericodi and recacodi = a.recpotcodi) order by info.fechacorte desc FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY) else (select emprnomb from vw_trn_empresa_str e where e.emprcodi = a.genemprcodi) end as genemprnombre, case when (select count(*) from trn_infoadicional_det info where info.infadicodi = a.cliemprcodi) > 0 then (select info.infadinomb from trn_infoadicional_det info where info.infadicodi = a.cliemprcodi and info.fechacorte <= (select recafecins from trn_recalculo where pericodi = a.pericodi and recacodi = a.recpotcodi) order by info.fechacorte desc FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY) else (select emprnomb from vw_trn_empresa_str e where e.emprcodi = a.cliemprcodi) end as cliemprnombre, d.barrnombre, e.barrnombre as barrnombrefco, a.*, a.pegrmipotecoincidente as pegrdpotecoincidente, a.pegrmifacperdida as pegrdfacperdida, nvl(tipcon.tipconcodi,0) as tipconcodi, tipcon.tipconnombre as tipconnombre from vtp_peaje_egreso_minfo a --inner join vw_si_empresa b on a.genemprcodi= b.emprcodi --inner join vw_si_empresa c on a.cliemprcodi= c.emprcodi inner join trn_barra d on a.barrcodi = d.barrcodi inner join trn_barra e on a.barrcodifco =e.barrcodi left outer join trn_tipo_contrato tipcon on tipcon.TIPCONCODI=a.TIPCONCONDI where pericodi=:pericodi and recpotcodi=:recpotcodi order by 1,2,3,4

select --b.emprnomb as genemprnombre,c.emprnomb as cliemprnombre, case when (select count(*) from trn_infoadicional_det info where info.infadicodi = a.genemprcodi) > 0 then (select info.infadinomb from trn_infoadicional_det info where info.infadicodi = a.genemprcodi and info.fechacorte <= (select recafecins from trn_recalculo where pericodi = a.pericodi and recacodi = a.recpotcodi) order by info.fechacorte desc FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY) else (select emprnomb from vw_trn_empresa_str e where e.emprcodi = a.genemprcodi) end as genemprnombre, case when (select count(*) from trn_infoadicional_det info where info.infadicodi = a.cliemprcodi) > 0 then (select info.infadinomb from trn_infoadicional_det info where info.infadicodi = a.cliemprcodi and info.fechacorte <= (select recafecins from trn_recalculo where pericodi = a.pericodi and recacodi = a.recpotcodi) order by info.fechacorte desc FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY) else (select emprnomb from vw_trn_empresa_str e where e.emprcodi = a.cliemprcodi) end as cliemprnombre, d.barrnombre, e.barrnombre as barrnombrefco, a.pegrcodi as pegrmicodi, a.pegrcodi, pericodi, recpotcodi, a.genemprcodi, a.pegrdcodi, a.cliemprcodi, a.barrcodi, a.pegrmitipousuario, a.pegrmilicitacion, a.pegrmipotecalculada, a.pegrmipotedeclarada, a.pegrmicalidad, a.pegrmipreciopote, a.pegrmipoteegreso, a.pegrmipeajeunitario, a.barrcodifco, a.pegrmipoteactiva, a.pegrmipotereactiva, a.pegrmiusucreacion, a.pegrmifeccreacion, a.pegrdpotecoincidente, a.pegrdfacperdida, a.coregecodvtp, a.tipconcodi, tipcon.tipconnombre from vw_vtp_peaje_egreso a --inner join vw_si_empresa b on a.genemprcodi = b.emprcodi --inner join vw_si_empresa c on a.cliemprcodi = c.emprcodi inner join trn_barra d on a.barrcodi = d.barrcodi inner join trn_barra e on a.barrcodifco = e.barrcodi left outer join trn_tipo_contrato tipcon on a.tipconcodi=tipcon.tipconcodi where pericodi=:pericodi and recpotcodi=:recpotcodi and (a.genemprcodi = :genemprcodi or :genemprcodi = 0) and (a.cliemprcodi = :cliemprcodi or :cliemprcodi = 0) and (a.barrcodi = :barrcodi or :barrcodi = 0) and (a.barrcodifco = :barrcodifco or :barrcodifco = 0) and (a.pegrmitipousuario = :pegrmitipousuario or :pegrmitipousuario = '*') and (a.pegrmilicitacion = :pegrmilicitacion or :pegrmilicitacion = '*') and (a.pegrmicalidad = :pegrmicalidad or a.pegrmicalidad = :pegrmiusucreacion or :pegrmicalidad = '*') order by 1, 2,3, 4

select --b.emprnomb as genemprnombre,c.emprnomb as cliemprnombre, case when (select count(*) from trn_infoadicional_det info where info.infadicodi = a.genemprcodi) > 0 then (select info.infadinomb from trn_infoadicional_det info where info.infadicodi = a.genemprcodi and info.fechacorte <= (select recafecins from trn_recalculo where pericodi = a.pericodi and recacodi = a.recpotcodi) order by info.fechacorte desc FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY) else (select emprnomb from vw_trn_empresa_str e where e.emprcodi = a.genemprcodi) end as genemprnombre, case when (select count(*) from trn_infoadicional_det info where info.infadicodi = a.cliemprcodi) > 0 then (select info.infadinomb from trn_infoadicional_det info where info.infadicodi = a.cliemprcodi and info.fechacorte <= (select recafecins from trn_recalculo where pericodi = a.pericodi and recacodi = a.recpotcodi) order by info.fechacorte desc FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY) else (select emprnomb from vw_trn_empresa_str e where e.emprcodi = a.cliemprcodi) end as cliemprnombre, d.barrnombre, a.pegrmitipousuario, a.pegrmilicitacion from vw_vtp_peaje_egreso a --inner join vw_si_empresa b on a.genemprcodi= b.emprcodi --inner join vw_si_empresa c on a.cliemprcodi= c.emprcodi inner join trn_barra d on a.barrcodi = d.barrcodi where pericodi=:barrcodi and recpotcodi=:barrcodifco minus select --b.emprnomb as genemprnombre,c.emprnomb as cliemprnombre, case when (select count(*) from trn_infoadicional_det info where info.infadicodi = a.genemprcodi) > 0 then (select info.infadinomb from trn_infoadicional_det info where info.infadicodi = a.genemprcodi and info.fechacorte <= (select recafecins from trn_recalculo where pericodi = a.pericodi and recacodi = a.recpotcodi) order by info.fechacorte desc FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY) else (select emprnomb from vw_trn_empresa_str e where e.emprcodi = a.genemprcodi) end as genemprnombre, case when (select count(*) from trn_infoadicional_det info where info.infadicodi = a.cliemprcodi) > 0 then (select info.infadinomb from trn_infoadicional_det info where info.infadicodi = a.cliemprcodi and info.fechacorte <= (select recafecins from trn_recalculo where pericodi = a.pericodi and recacodi = a.recpotcodi) order by info.fechacorte desc FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY) else (select emprnomb from vw_trn_empresa_str e where e.emprcodi = a.cliemprcodi) end as cliemprnombre, d.barrnombre, a.pegrmitipousuario, a.pegrmilicitacion from vw_vtp_peaje_egreso a --inner join vw_si_empresa b on a.genemprcodi= b.emprcodi --inner join vw_si_empresa c on a.cliemprcodi= c.emprcodi inner join trn_barra d on a.barrcodi = d.barrcodi where pericodi=:pericodi and recpotcodi=:recpotcodi order by 1, 2, 3

select genemprcodi, genemprnombre from ( select distinct a.genemprcodi, bc.emprnomb as genemprnombre,a.genemprcodi as empresa from vw_vtp_peaje_egreso a inner join vw_si_empresa bc on a.genemprcodi = bc.emprcodi where a.pericodi=:pericodi and a.recpotcodi = :recpotcodi union --select distinct a.emprcodi as genemprcodi, b.emprnomb as genemprnombre --from trn_ing_retirosc a --inner join vw_si_empresa b on a.emprcodi = b.emprcodi --where a.pericodi=:pericodi and a.ingrscversion = :recpotcodi select t.genemprcodi, bx.emprnomb as genemprnombre, t.emprcodiorigen as empresa from ( select distinct nvl(m.emprcodidestino,ab.emprcodi) genemprcodi, nvl(m.emprcodiorigen,ab.emprcodi) emprcodiorigen from trn_ing_retirosc ab left join vw_si_migracion m on m.emprcodiorigen = ab.emprcodi where ab.pericodi=:pericodi and ab.ingrscversion = :recpotcodi ) t inner join vw_si_empresa bx on bx.emprcodi = t.genemprcodi union select distinct nvl(m.emprcodidestino,ax.emprcodipeaje) as genemprcodi, trim(b.emprnomb) as genemprnombre, nvl(m.emprcodiorigen,ax.emprcodipeaje) as empresa from vtp_peaje_empresa_pago ax inner join si_empresa b on ax.emprcodipeaje = b.emprcodi and b.emprestado = 'A' left join vw_si_migracion m on m.emprcodiorigen = ax.emprcodipeaje where ax.pempagpericodidest=:pericodi ) where genemprcodi = empresa order by 2

select 0 as pegrmicodi, a.*, --b.emprnomb as genemprnombre, e.emprnomb as cliemprnombre, case when (select count(*) from trn_infoadicional_det info where info.infadicodi = a.genemprcodi) > 0 then (select info.infadinomb from trn_infoadicional_det info where info.infadicodi = a.genemprcodi and info.fechacorte <= (select recafecins from trn_recalculo where pericodi = a.pericodi and recacodi = a.recpotcodi) order by info.fechacorte desc FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY) else (select emprnomb from vw_trn_empresa_str e where e.emprcodi = a.genemprcodi) end as genemprnombre, case when (select count(*) from trn_infoadicional_det info where info.infadicodi = a.cliemprcodi) > 0 then (select info.infadinomb from trn_infoadicional_det info where info.infadicodi = a.cliemprcodi and info.fechacorte <= (select recafecins from trn_recalculo where pericodi = a.pericodi and recacodi = a.recpotcodi) order by info.fechacorte desc FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY) else (select emprnomb from vw_trn_empresa_str e where e.emprcodi = a.cliemprcodi) end as cliemprnombre, c.barrnombre, d.barrnombre as barrnombrefco from vw_vtp_peaje_egreso a --inner join vw_si_empresa b on a.genemprcodi = b.emprcodi --inner join vw_si_empresa e on a.cliemprcodi = e.emprcodi inner join trn_barra c on a.barrcodi = c.barrcodi inner join trn_barra d on a.barrcodifco = d.barrcodi where a.pericodi=:pericodi and a.recpotcodi = :recpotcodi and genemprcodi = :genemprcodi

select 0 as pegrmicodi, a.*, --b.emprnomb as genemprnombre, e.emprnomb as cliemprnombre, case when (select count(*) from trn_infoadicional_det info where info.infadicodi = a.genemprcodi) > 0 then (select info.infadinomb from trn_infoadicional_det info where info.infadicodi = a.genemprcodi and info.fechacorte <= (select recafecins from trn_recalculo where pericodi = a.pericodi and recacodi = a.recpotcodi) order by info.fechacorte desc FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY) else (select emprnomb from vw_trn_empresa_str e where e.emprcodi = a.genemprcodi) end as genemprnombre, case when (select count(*) from trn_infoadicional_det info where info.infadicodi = a.cliemprcodi) > 0 then (select info.infadinomb from trn_infoadicional_det info where info.infadicodi = a.cliemprcodi and info.fechacorte <= (select recafecins from trn_recalculo where pericodi = a.pericodi and recacodi = a.recpotcodi) order by info.fechacorte desc FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY) else (select emprnomb from vw_trn_empresa_str e where e.emprcodi = a.cliemprcodi) end as cliemprnombre, c.barrnombre, d.barrnombre as barrnombrefco from vw_vtp_peaje_egreso a --inner join vw_si_empresa b on a.genemprcodi = b.emprcodi --inner join vw_si_empresa e on a.cliemprcodi = e.emprcodi inner join trn_barra c on a.barrcodi = c.barrcodi inner join trn_barra d on a.barrcodifco = d.barrcodi where a.pericodi=:pericodi and a.recpotcodi = :recpotcodi and genemprcodi = :genemprcodi

select t.emprcodi as genemprcodi, --(select emprnomb from vw_si_empresa e where e.emprcodi = t.emprcodi) as genemprnombre, case when (select count(*) from trn_infoadicional_det info where info.infadicodi = t.emprcodi) > 0 then (select info.infadinomb from trn_infoadicional_det info where info.infadicodi = t.emprcodi and info.fechacorte <= (select recpotfeccreacion from vtp_recalculo_potencia where pericodi = :pericodi and recpotcodi = :recpotcodi) order by info.fechacorte desc FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY) else (select emprnomb from vw_trn_empresa_str e where e.emprcodi = t.emprcodi) end as genemprnombre, sum(t.bipotencia) as pegrmipotecalculada, sum(t.lipotencia) as pegrmipotedeclarada, sum(t.scpotencia) as pegrmipreciopote, sum(t.bivalor) as pegrmipoteegreso, sum(t.livalor) as pegrmipeajeunitario, sum(t.scvalor) as pegrmipoteactiva from ( select pe.genemprcodi as emprcodi, sum(pe.pegrmipoteegreso) as bipotencia, 0 as lipotencia, 0 as scpotencia, sum(pe.pegrmipoteegreso * pe.pegrmipreciopote) as bivalor, 0 as livalor, 0 as scvalor from vw_vtp_peaje_egreso pe where UPPER(pegrmilicitacion) = 'NO' and pericodi = :pericodi and recpotcodi = :recpotcodi group by pe.genemprcodi union select pe.genemprcodi as emprcodi, 0 as bipotencia, sum(pe.pegrmipoteegreso) as lipotencia, 0 as scpotencia, 0 as bivalor, sum(pe.pegrmipoteegreso * pe.pegrmipreciopote) as livalor, 0 as scvalor from vw_vtp_peaje_egreso pe where UPPER(pegrmilicitacion) = 'SI' and pericodi = :pericodi and recpotcodi = :recpotcodi group by pe.genemprcodi union --select rp.emprcodi, --0 as bipotencia, 0 as lipotencia, sum(rp.ingrscimporte * egreso) as scpotencia, --0 as bivalor, 0 as livalor, sum(rp.ingrscimporte * valor) as scvalor --from trn_ing_retirosc rp, (select sum(rpscpoteegreso) as egreso, sum(rpscpreciopote * rpscpoteegreso) as valor --from vtp_retiro_potesc rpsc --where pericodi = :pericodi --and recpotcodi = :recpotcodi) t --where pericodi = :pericodi and rp.ingrscversion in (select recacodi from vtp_recalculo_potencia where pericodi = :pericodi and recpotcodi = :recpotcodi) --group by rp.emprcodi select nvl(pe.emprcodi, nvl(t.emprcodidestino, t.emprcodi)) emprcodi, bipotencia, lipotencia, scpotencia, bivalor, livalor, scvalor from ( select rp.emprcodi,si.emprcodidestino, 0 as bipotencia, 0 as lipotencia, sum(rp.ingrscimportevtp * (select sum(rpscpoteegreso) as egreso from vtp_retiro_potesc rpsc where pericodi = :pericodi and recpotcodi = :recpotcodi)) as scpotencia, 0 as bivalor, 0 as livalor, sum(rp.ingrscimportevtp * (select sum(rpscpreciopote * rpscpoteegreso) as valor from vtp_retiro_potesc rpsc where pericodi = :pericodi and recpotcodi = :recpotcodi)) as scvalor from trn_ing_retirosc rp left join vw_si_migracion si on si.emprcodiorigen = rp.emprcodi where pericodi = :pericodi and rp.ingrscversion in (select recacodi from vtp_recalculo_potencia where pericodi = :pericodi and recpotcodi = :recpotcodi) group by rp.emprcodi,si.emprcodidestino) t left join vtp_peaje_empresa pe on pe.pericodi = :pericodi and recpotcodi = :recpotcodi and (pe.emprcodi = t.emprcodi or pe.emprcodi = t.emprcodidestino) ) t group by t.emprcodi order by 2
delete from vtp_peaje_egreso_minfo where pericodi = :pericodi and recpotcodi=:recpotcodi

select distinct a.genemprcodi, --b.emprnomb as genemprnombre case when (select count(*) from trn_infoadicional_det info where info.infadicodi = a.genemprcodi) > 0 then (select info.infadinomb from trn_infoadicional_det info where info.infadicodi = a.genemprcodi and info.fechacorte <= (select recafecins from trn_recalculo where pericodi = a.pericodi and recacodi = a.recpotcodi) order by info.fechacorte desc FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY) else (select emprnomb from vw_trn_empresa_str e where e.emprcodi = a.genemprcodi) end as genemprnombre from vw_vtp_peaje_egreso a --inner join vw_si_empresa b on a.genemprcodi = b.emprcodi where a.pericodi=:pericodi and a.recpotcodi = :recpotcodi order by 2

select distinct * from ( select a.empresa as genemprnombre, a.cliente as cliemprnombre, a.barra as barrnombre, a.barra as barrnombrefco, 0 as pegrmicodi, 0 as pegrcodi, 0 pericodi, 0 as recpotcodi, a.emprcodi as genemprcodi, 0 as pegrdcodi, a.clicodi as cliemprcodi, a.barrcodi, a.tipusunombre as pegrmitipousuario, a.tipconnombre as pegrmilicitacion, null as pegrmipotecalculada, null as pegrmipotedeclarada, '' as pegrmicalidad, null as pegrmipreciopote, null as pegrmipoteegreso, null as pegrmipeajeunitario, a.barrcodi as barrcodifco, null as pegrmipoteactiva, null as pegrmipotereactiva, '' as pegrmiusucreacion, '' as pegrmifeccreacion, null as pegrdpotecoincidente, null as pegrdfacperdida, a.codcncodivtp as coregecodvtp, a.tipconcodi, a.tipconnombre from vtp_codigo_consolidado_periodo ccp inner join VTP_CODIGO_CONSOLIDADO a on a.codcncodivtp=ccp.codcncodivtp inner join vtp_codigo_retiro_generado crg on ccp.codcncodivtp=crg.coregecodvtp inner join vtp_codigo_retiro_sol_det vcr on vcr.coresdcodi=crg.coresdcodi inner join trn_codigo_retiro_solicitud crs on crs.coresocodi=vcr.coresocodi where ccp.CODCNPEESTADO in ('ACT') and crg.coregeestado in ('ACT') and NVL(to_char(crs.coresofechainicio, 'YYYYMM'), '000000') <= (select to_char(peridcaniomes) from TRN_PERIODO_DECLARACION where peridccodi = :pericodi) AND NVL(to_char(crs.coresofechafin, 'YYYYMM'), '999999') >= (select to_char(peridcaniomes) from TRN_PERIODO_DECLARACION where peridccodi = :pericodi) AND (a.emprcodi = :genemprcodi or :genemprcodi = 0) and (a.clicodi = :cliemprcodi or :cliemprcodi = 0) and (a.barrcodi = :barrcodi or :barrcodi = 0) and (a.tipusunombre = :pegrmitipousuario or :pegrmitipousuario = '*') and ccp.peridccodi=:pericodi and (a.tipconnombre = :tipconnombre or :tipconnombre = '*') order by a.empresa, a.cliente, a.barra) order by 28

select --b.emprnomb as genemprnombre, c.emprnomb as cliemprnombre, case when (select count(*) from trn_infoadicional_det info where info.infadicodi = a.genemprcodi) > 0 then (select info.infadinomb from trn_infoadicional_det info where info.infadicodi = a.genemprcodi and info.fechacorte <= (select recafecins from trn_recalculo where pericodi = a.pericodi and recacodi = a.recpotcodi) order by info.fechacorte desc FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY) else (select emprnomb from vw_trn_empresa_str e where e.emprcodi = a.genemprcodi) end as genemprnombre, case when (select count(*) from trn_infoadicional_det info where info.infadicodi = a.cliemprcodi) > 0 then (select info.infadinomb from trn_infoadicional_det info where info.infadicodi = a.cliemprcodi and info.fechacorte <= (select recafecins from trn_recalculo where pericodi = a.pericodi and recacodi = a.recpotcodi) order by info.fechacorte desc FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY) else (select emprnomb from vw_trn_empresa_str e where e.emprcodi = a.cliemprcodi) end as cliemprnombre, d.barrnombre, e.barrnombre as barrnombrefco, a.pegrcodi as pegrmicodi, a.pegrcodi, pericodi, recpotcodi, a.genemprcodi, a.pegrdcodi, a.cliemprcodi, a.barrcodi, a.pegrmitipousuario, a.pegrmilicitacion, a.pegrmipotecalculada, a.pegrmipotedeclarada, a.pegrmicalidad, a.pegrmipreciopote, a.pegrmipoteegreso, a.pegrmipeajeunitario, a.barrcodifco, a.pegrmipoteactiva, a.pegrmipotereactiva, a.pegrmiusucreacion, a.pegrmifeccreacion, a.pegrdpotecoincidente, a.pegrdfacperdida, a.coregecodvtp, a.tipconcodi, tipcon.tipconnombre from vw_vtp_peaje_egreso a --inner join vw_si_empresa b on a.genemprcodi = b.emprcodi --inner join vw_si_empresa c on a.cliemprcodi = c.emprcodi inner join trn_barra d on a.barrcodi = d.barrcodi inner join trn_barra e on a.barrcodifco = e.barrcodi left outer join trn_tipo_contrato tipcon on a.tipconcodi=tipcon.tipconcodi where pericodi=:pericodi and recpotcodi=:recpotcodi and (a.genemprcodi = :genemprcodi or :genemprcodi = 0) and (a.cliemprcodi = :cliemprcodi or :cliemprcodi = 0) and (a.barrcodi = :barrcodi or :barrcodi = 0) and (a.pegrmitipousuario = :pegrmitipousuario or :pegrmitipousuario = '*') and (tipcon.tipconnombre = :pegrmilicitacion or :pegrmilicitacion = '*') and (a.pegrmicalidad = :pegrmicalidad or a.pegrmicalidad = :pegrmiusucreacion or :pegrmicalidad = '*') order by 1,2,3,4
